entry.title: swift çš„åŸºç¡€çŸ¥è¯†
entry.content:
1. from objc to swift

const int count = 10; 
double price = 23.55;

NSString *firstMessage = @"Objc is awesome. ";
NSString *secondMessage = @"What do you think?";
NSString *message = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@%@", firstMessage, secondMessage];

NSLog(@"%@", message);


let count = 10
var price = 23.55

let firstMessage = "Swift is awesome. "
let secondMessage = "What do you think?"
var message = firstMessage + secondMessage

print(message)

2. å¸¸é‡ å’Œ å˜é‡

let constant = 10
var y = 10
var x = y + constant

3. ç±»å‹æ¨è®º

// æŒ‰ä½ option éµ + é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»ä»»ä¸€å˜é‡ = å¾—å‡ºè¯¥å˜é‡çš„ç±»å‹

let constant:Int = 10
var y:Int = 10
var x:Int = y + constant

4. å­—ç¬¦ä¸² String

var message:String = "Talk is cheap, show me the code"

// å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¿½åŠ 
var greeting = "Hello"
var name = "xiaoming"
var message = greeting + name

// å¤§å†™å’Œå°å†™è½¬æ¢
message.uppercased()
message.lowercased()

// å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸ªæ•°
message.count

// ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢
var totalPrice:Int = 100
var totalPriceMessage = "The price of the book is $" + String(totalPrice)

5.æµç¨‹æ§åˆ¶

var time = 6

if time == 6 {
    print("è‡ªå·±ç…®æ—©é¤")
} else {
    print("åˆ°å¤–é¢ä¹°æ—©é¤")
}

// æˆ–è€…

switch time {
case 6:
    print("è‡ªå·±ç…®æ—©é¤")
default:
    print("åˆ°å¤–é¢ä¹°æ—©é¤")
}


var money = 9999

if money >= 100000 {
    print("å‡ºå›½æ¸¸")
} else if money >= 10000 && money < 100000 {
    print("å›½å†…æ¸¸")
} else if money >= 1000 && money < 10000 {
    print("çœå†…æ¸¸")
} else {
    print("å¸‚å†…æ¸¸")
}

// æˆ–è€…

switch money {
case 100000...:
    print("å‡ºå›½æ¸¸")
case 10000...99999:
    print("å›½å†…æ¸¸")
case 1000...9999:
    print("çœå†…æ¸¸")
default:
    print("å¸‚å†…æ¸¸")
}

6. æ•°ç»„ Array

var book1 = "æ°´æµ’ä¼ "
var book2 = "ä¸‰å›½æ¼”ä¹‰"
var book3 = "è¥¿æ¸¸è®°"

var bookArray = [book1, book2, book3]

// è·å–ç¬¬ä¸€æœ¬ä¹¦
print(bookArray[0])

// æ·»åŠ ä¸€æœ¬ä¹¦
bookArray.append("çº¢æ¥¼æ¢¦")

// ä¸€å…±æœ‰å¤šå°‘æœ¬ä¹¦
bookArray.count


// éå†æ‰€æœ‰ä¹¦ç±
for index in 0...3{
    print(bookArray[index])
}

for index in 0...bookArray.count-1{
    print(bookArray[index])
}

for book in bookArray {
    print(book)
}

7. å­—å…¸ Dictionary

var animalDict = [
    "cat": "ğŸ±",
    "dog": "ğŸ¶",
    "pig": "ğŸ·",
    "cow": "ğŸ®"
]

// è¿™é‡Œæœ‰å‡ºç°ä¸€ä¸ªè­¦å‘Šâš ï¸ Expression implicitly coerced from 'String?' to 'Any'
print(animalDict["dog"])

for (key, value) in animalDict {
    print("Title: \(key)")
    print("Emoji: \(value)")
    print("---")
}

8. å¯é€‰ç±»å‹ Optionals

// å£°æ˜ä¸€ä¸ªä¸º nil çš„ å¯é€‰ç±»å‹ å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
var hobby: String?

hobby = "running"

// âŒ Value of optional type 'String?' must be unwrapped to a value of type 'String'
// var message = "Your hobby is " + hobby

// æ‰€ä»¥å–å€¼çš„æ—¶ï¼Œåº”è¯¥è§£å¼€å¯é€‰ç±»å‹

// 1. æš´åŠ›è§£å¼€ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ„Ÿå¹å· ï¼
if hobby != nil {
    var message = "Your hobby is " + hobby!
    print(message)

}

// 2. å¯é€‰ç»‘å®šï¼Œå°±æ˜¯å°†ä¸€ä¸ª æœ‰å€¼çš„å¯é€‰ç±»å‹ èµ‹ç»™ä¸€ä¸ª ä¸´æ—¶çš„å˜é‡
if let hobbyValue = hobby {
    var message = "Your hobby is " + hobbyValue
    print(message)
}

/*
 æ€»ç»“ï¼š
    ä½¿ç”¨äº†å¯é€‰ç±»å‹ï¼Œå°±ç›¸å½“äºæ˜¯å¿«é€’çš„â€œè´§ä»¶æ‰“åŒ…â€
    å¯é€‰ç±»å‹äº§ç”Ÿäº†ä¿æŠ¤çš„ä½œç”¨
    æ”¶åˆ°å¿«é€’ä¹‹åï¼Œåªæœ‰æ‹†å¼€å¿«é€’ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½å–å‡ºè´§ä»¶ï¼Œè¿™å°±æ˜¯å–å€¼

entry.title: Rails + Nginx in Mac
entry.content:
Step1. Rails é¡¹ç›®å‡†å¤‡

$ rails new deploy_demo
$ rails g controller welcome index
$ rails s

$ cd deploy_demo
$ git init
$ git add .
$ git commit -m "Init commit"

Step2. Nginx å®‰è£…å’Œå¯åŠ¨

# å®‰è£…
$ brew install nginx 

# å¼€å¯
$ brew services start nginx

# å…³é—­
$ brew services stop nginx

# é‡å¯
$ brew services restart nginx

Step3. Nginx é…ç½®

$ touch /usr/local/etc/nginx/servers/rails_nginx.conf

upstream app {
    # æ”¹æˆå®é™… puma.sock çš„æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
    server unix://Users/liangyk/rails_project/deploy_demo/tmp/sockets/puma.sock;
}

server {
    listen 1234;
    # æ”¹æˆå®é™…æœåŠ¡å™¨åŸŸå
    server_name localhost;

    # æ”¹æˆå®é™… APP è·¯å¾„
    root /Users/liangyk/rails_project/deploy_demo/public;

    try_files $uri/index.html $uri @app;

    location @app {
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header Host $http_host;
        proxy_redirect off;
        proxy_pass http://app;
    }

    error_page 500 502 503 504 /500.html;
    keepalive_timeout 10;
}

Step4. Puma é…ç½®

config/puma.rb

# port        ENV.fetch("PORT") { 3000 }
+ bind "unix://tmp/sockets/puma.sock"
+ daemonize true

Step5. è„šæœ¬æ§åˆ¶

$ touch pumactrl.sh

#!/bin/bash

case "$1" in
    "")
        echo -n "please provide a parameter (start, stop, reload)."
        ;;
    start)
        echo -n "starting db:migrate..."
        bin/rails db:migrate
        echo -n "starting assets:precompile..."
        bin/rails assets:precompile
        echo -n "starting puma..."
        puma -e production
        ;;
    stop)
        echo "stoping puma..."
        kill `cat "tmp/pids/server.pid"`
        ;;
esac

$  bash ./pumactrl.sh start

entry.title: å¤Ÿç”¨ç‰ˆçš„ jbuilder
entry.content:
Step1. _item.json.jbuilder

$ touch app/views/api/v1/articles/_item.json.jbuilder

# app/views/api/v1/articles/_item.json.jbuilder

json.title article.title
json.content article.content

Step2. show.json.jbuilder

$ touch app/views/api/v1/articles/show.json.jbuilder

# app/views/api/v1/articles/show.json.jbuilder

json.article do
  json.partial! 'item', article: @article
end

â¬‡ï¸

{
  "article": {
    "title": "æ˜æ˜",
    "content": "sun and moon"
  }
}

Step3. index.json.jbuilder

$ app/views/api/v1/articles/index.json.jbuilder

# app/views/api/v1/articles/index.json.jbuilder

json.list do
  json.array! @articles, partial: 'item', as: :article
end

â¬‡ï¸

{
  "articles": [
    {
      "title": "æ˜æ˜",
      "content": "sun and moon"
    },
    {
      "title": "å°çº¢",
      "content": "æˆ‘çˆ±ä½ å°çº¢"
    }
  ]
}

Step4. gem 'will_paginate'

+ gem 'will_paginate'

$ bundle

# app/controllers/api/v1/articles_controller.rb

  def index
    #@articles = Article.all
    @articles = Article.paginate(page: params[:page])
  end

# app/views/api/v1/articles/index.json.jbuilder

piece = @articles
json.meta do
  json.current_page piece.current_page
  json.total_pages piece.total_pages
  json.per_page piece.per_page
  json.total_entries piece.total_entries
end

json.articles do
  json.array! @articles, partial: 'item', as: :article
end

â¬‡ï¸

http://localhost:3000/api/v1/articles?auth_token=_DnWEG22XTfW4U8s5M5x&page=2

â¬‡ï¸

{
  "meta": {
    "current_page": 2,
    "total_pages": 3,
    "per_page": 5,
    "total_entries": 11
  },
  "articles": [
    {
      "title": "å°çº¢4",
      "content": "æˆ‘çˆ±ä½ å°çº¢"
    },
    {
      "title": "å°çº¢5",
      "content": "æˆ‘çˆ±ä½ å°çº¢"
    },
    {
      "title": "å°çº¢6",
      "content": "æˆ‘çˆ±ä½ å°çº¢"
    },
    {
      "title": "å°çº¢7",
      "content": "æˆ‘çˆ±ä½ å°çº¢"
    },
    {
      "title": "å°çº¢8",
      "content": "æˆ‘çˆ±ä½ å°çº¢"
    }
  ]
}

entry.title: Objc and Ruby relationships 4 Class&Module
entry.content:
ç±»

å®šä¹‰ç±»

objc:

// Cat.h

#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>

@interface Cat : NSObject
-(void)eat:(NSString*)food;
@end

// Cat.m

#import "Cat.h"

@implementation Cat
-(void)eat:(NSString*)food{
	NSLog(@"%@, å¥½å¥½åƒï¼",food);
}
@end

// main.m

#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
#import "Cat.h"
int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
	@autoreleasepool {
		Cat * cat = [Cat new];
	    [cat eat:@"å°é±¼"];
	}
}

ruby:

class Cat
	def eat(food)
		puts "#{food}ï¼Œå¥½å¥½åƒ!"
	end
end

kitty = Cat.new
kitty.eat "å°é­š"  #=> å°é­šï¼Œå¥½å¥½åƒ!

åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•

objc:

...
- (instancetype)init
{
    if(self = [super init])//è¯´æ˜çˆ¶ç±»çš„initæ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡ŒæˆåŠŸ
    {
     // åˆå§‹åŒ–å­ç±»è‡ªå·±çš„å±æ€§;
    }
    return self;
}
...

ruby:

class Cat
  def initialize(name, gender)
    @name = name
    @gender = gender
  end

  def say_hello
    puts "hello, my name is #{@name}"
  end
end

kitty = Cat.new("kitty", "female")
kitty.say_hello    # => hello, my name is kitty

å®ä¾‹å˜é‡å’Œå±æ€§

objc:

// Cat.h

#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>

@interface Cat : NSObject
@property(nonatomic, strong)NSString *name; // å±æ€§
-(id)initWithName:(NSString*)name andGender:(NSString*)gender;
-(void)sayHello;
@end

// Cat.m

#import "Cat.h"
@interface Cat ()
{
	NSString* _name; // å®ä¾‹å˜é‡
	NSString* _gender;
}
@end
@implementation Cat
-(id)initWithName:(NSString*)name andGender:(NSString*)gender{
	if(self = [super init])
	{
		_name = name;
		_gender = gender;
	}
	return self;
}

-(void)sayHello{
	NSLog(@"hello, my name is %@", _name);
}
@end

// main.m

#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
#import "Cat.h"
int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
	@autoreleasepool {
		Cat * cat = [[Cat alloc]initWithName:@"kitty" andGender:@"female"];
	    [cat sayHello];  // => hello, my name is kitty
	}
}

ruby:

class Cat
  attr_accessor :name #å±æ€§ 

  def initialize(name, gender)
    @name = name # å®ä¾‹å˜é‡
    @gender = gender
  end
    
  def say_hello
    puts "hello, my name is #{@name}" # => hello, my name is kitty
  end
end

ç±»æ–¹æ³•å’Œå¯¹è±¡æ–¹æ³•

objc:

// Cat.m

#import "Cat.h"
@interface Cat ()
@end
@implementation Cat
+(void)info{
//	ç±»æ–¹æ³•
}
-(void)sayHello{
// å¯¹è±¡æ–¹æ³•
}
@end

ruby:

class Cat
  # ç±»æ–¹æ³•
  def self.info 
    # ...
  end

 # å¯¹è±¡æ–¹æ³•
  def say_hello
    # ...
  end
end

æ¨¡å—

objc:

// NSObject+Flyable.h

#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>

@interface NSObject (Flyable)
-(void)fly;
@end

// NSObject+Flyable.m

#import "NSObject+Flyable.h"

@implementation NSObject (Flyable)
-(void)fly{
	NSLog(@"I can fly!");
}
@end

// Cat.h

#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
#import "NSObject+Flyable.h"

@interface Cat : NSObject
@end

// Cat.m

#import "Cat.h"

@implementation Cat
@end

// main.m

#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
#import "Cat.h"
int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
	@autoreleasepool {
	    Cat * cat = [Cat new];
	    [cat fly];  // => I can fly!
	}
}

ruby:

module Flyable
  def fly
    puts "I can fly!"
  end
end

class Cat
  include Flyable
end

kitty = Cat.new
kitty.fly        # => I can fly!

å‚è€ƒèµ„æ–™ï¼š
railsbook

  • æŒç»­æ›´æ–°ã€‚
  • è‹¥æœ‰æ›´å¥½çš„èµ„æ–™ï¼Œæ„Ÿè°¢äº¤æµã€‚
  • è‹¥æœ‰é”™è¯¯çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œæ„Ÿè°¢æ–§æ­£ã€‚
